channel.description: Recent content in Flat on Hugo中文文档

item.description: Tinyce Tinyce is a general-purpose Hugo theme. You can check the live version here. Getting started Once you have Hugo up and running, you must: Create a Hugo project: $ hugo new site my-site And then install tinyce: $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/roperzh/tinyce-hugo-theme If you are using Hugo v0.11 or below, please read this Now you can set tinyce as the default theme for your site by adding this line in the config file:
